text: Nana Adwoa Awindor is a Ghanaian television host and the Development Queenmother of Afigya-Kwabre district in the Ashanti Region of Ghana. In 2013, she was elected the First President of the Continental Executive Board of the African Queens and Women Cultural Leaders Network. She is a member of the Ghana National Union of Queenmothers (Women Traditional Leaders). ==Career== Awindor is the regular host of late night television show Greetings from Abroad/Back Home Again, and the CEO of a production company, Premier Productions. ==Personal life== Awindor is a native of Adum Kwanwoma. She is the mother of singer Efya. == Award == Awindor was named CIMG Marketing Woman of the Year (2006). ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian television presenters
title: Nana Adwoa Awindor
